TopicTitle: What are you doing in KSP?

Articles.Content: What are you doing in KSP? What do you plan? If possible, upload any screenshots, any mods, if yes, list them?

Hey Scaprod may I direct your attention to these fine threads?

These already existing threads are quite similar to what you have in mind.  In order to keep the number of threads manageable and to avoid redundancy this thread will now be closed.  Thank you and...

Happy landings!
